blocks.name: isdir
blocks.content: A condition for a relation to be a direction. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 25-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm isdir(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, cdir), wa(wa(wrel(c0), wss(cres(cid, c2), c0)), wa(wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wss(cxp(c2, c2), ccom(ccnv(c0), c0))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(cuni(c0)))
} = {
  elab2g(hs0, c0, c1, cdir, wa(wa(wrel(c0), wss(cres(cid, c2), c0)), wa(wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wss(cxp(c2, c2), ccom(ccnv(c0), c0)))), wa(wa(wrel(cv(hs0)), wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(cv(hs0)))), cv(hs0))), wa(wss(ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wss(cxp(cuni(cuni(cv(hs0))), cuni(cuni(cv(hs0)))), ccom(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs0))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wrel(cv(hs0)), wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(cv(hs0)))), cv(hs0))), wa(wss(ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wss(cxp(cuni(cuni(cv(hs0))), cuni(cuni(cv(hs0)))), ccom(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)))), wa(wrel(c0), wss(cres(cid, c2), c0)), wa(wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wss(cxp(c2, c2), ccom(ccnv(c0), c0))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wrel(cv(hs0)), wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(cv(hs0)))), cv(hs0)), wrel(c0), wss(cres(cid, c2), c0))
  releq(cv(hs0), c0)
  sseq12d(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(cv(hs0)))), cv(hs0), cres(cid, c2), c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  reseq2d(cid, cuni(cuni(cv(hs0))), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wss(ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wss(cxp(cuni(cuni(cv(hs0))), cuni(cuni(cv(hs0)))), ccom(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs0))), wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wss(cxp(c2, c2), ccom(ccnv(c0), c0)))
  sseq12d(ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), ccom(c0, c0), c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  coeq12d(cv(hs0), cv(hs0), c0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  sseq12d(cxp(cuni(cuni(cv(hs0))), cuni(cuni(cv(hs0)))), ccom(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), cxp(c2, c2), ccom(ccnv(c0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  sqxpeqd(cuni(cuni(cv(hs0))), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cuni(cuni(cv(hs0))), c2, cuni(cuni(c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  unieqd(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  unieq(cv(hs0), c0)
  coeq12d(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), ccnv(c0), c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  cnveq(cv(hs0), c0)
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  df-dir(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wa(wrel(c0), wss(cres(cid, c2), c0)), wa(wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wss(cxp(c2, c2), ccom(ccnv(c0), c0)))))
}

blocks.name: dirdm
blocks.content: A direction's domain is equal to its field. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 25-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:

  eqssd(cdm(c0), cuni(cuni(c0)), wcel(c0, cdir))

  sstri(cdm(c0), cuni(cuni(c0)), cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))
  ssun1(cdm(c0), crn(c0))
  dmrnssfld(c0)
  syl5eqssr(cuni(cuni(c0)), cdm(c0), cdm(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0)))), wcel(c0, cdir))
  dmresi(cuni(cuni(c0)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cdir), wss(cdm(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0)))), cdm(c0)), wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), c0))
  simplrd(wcel(c0, cdir), wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), c0), wrel(c0), wa(wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wss(cxp(cuni(cuni(c0)), cuni(cuni(c0))), ccom(ccnv(c0), c0))))
  ibi(wcel(c0, cdir), wa(wa(wrel(c0), wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), c0)), wa(wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wss(cxp(cuni(cuni(c0)), cuni(cuni(c0))), ccom(ccnv(c0), c0)))))
  isdir(c0, cdir, cuni(cuni(c0)))
  eqid(cuni(cuni(c0)))
  dmss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), c0)
}

blocks.name: dirref
blocks.content: A direction is reflexive. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 25-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Nov-2013.)

thm dirref(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cdir), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cdm(c0))
} = {
  impel(wcel(c0, cdir), wcel(c1, c2), wbr(c1, c0, c1), wbr(c1, cres(cid, c2), c1))
  ssbrd(c1, cres(cid, c2), c1, c0, wcel(c0, cdir))
  eqsstrd(cres(cid, c2), c0, cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), wcel(c0, cdir))
  reseq2d(cid, c2, cuni(cuni(c0)), wcel(c0, cdir))
  syl5eq(c2, cuni(cuni(c0)), cdm(c0), wcel(c0, cdir))
  dirdm(c0)
  simplrd(wcel(c0, cdir), wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), c0), wrel(c0), wa(wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wss(cxp(cuni(cuni(c0)), cuni(cuni(c0))), ccom(ccnv(c0), c0))))
  ibi(wcel(c0, cdir), wa(wa(wrel(c0), wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), c0)), wa(wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wss(cxp(cuni(cuni(c0)), cuni(cuni(c0))), ccom(ccnv(c0), c0)))))
  isdir(c0, cdir, cuni(cuni(c0)))
  eqid(cuni(cuni(c0)))
  mpbiri(wcel(c1, c2), wbr(c1, cres(cid, c2), c1), wceq(c1, c1))
  eqid(c1)
  anidms(wcel(c1, c2), wb(wbr(c1, cres(cid, c2), c1), wceq(c1, c1)))
  resieq(c1, c2, c1)
}

thm dirtr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  syl(wcel(c0, cdir), wi(wa(wbr(c3, c0, c4), wbr(c4, c0, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, universe), wcel(c4, universe))), wrel(c0))

  3expia(wcel(c3, universe), wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c1, c2), wi(wcel(c0, cdir), wi(wa(wbr(c3, c0, c4), wbr(c4, c0, c1)), wbr(c3, c0, c1))))

  sylib(wcel(c0, cdir), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)))))), wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0))
  simprld(wcel(c0, cdir), wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wa(wrel(c0), wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), c0)), wss(cxp(cuni(cuni(c0)), cuni(cuni(c0))), ccom(ccnv(c0), c0)))
  ibi(wcel(c0, cdir), wa(wa(wrel(c0), wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), c0)), wa(wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0), wss(cxp(cuni(cuni(c0)), cuni(cuni(c0))), ccom(ccnv(c0), c0)))))
  isdir(c0, cdir, cuni(cuni(c0)))

  spc3gv(hs0, hs1, hs2, c3, universe, c4, universe, c1, c2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2))), wi(wa(wbr(c3, c0, c4), wbr(c4, c0, c1)), wbr(c3, c0, c1)))
  imbi12d(w3a(wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(cv(hs1), c4), wceq(cv(hs2), c1)), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wa(wbr(c3, c0, c4), wbr(c4, c0, c1)), wbr(c3, c0, c1))
